item.title: now and then I go back and read this, one of the best, most formative pieces of 'internet writing' ever. seven years old, still makes me laugh aloud. "When my roommate leaves for work in the morning, I genuflect toward his wonderful dog, who respects me." https://www.vice.com/en/article/dpwa7w/i-played-the-boys-are-back-in-town-on-a-bar-jukebox-until-i-got-kicked-out-832
item.dc:creator: @hiyalauren
item.description:
now and then I go back and read this, one of the best, most formative pieces of 'internet writing' ever. seven years old, still makes me laugh aloud. "When my roommate leaves for work in the morning, I genuflect toward his wonderful dog, who respects me."
vice.com/en/article/dpwa7w/iâ€¦

item.title: RT by @hiyalauren: Hello! I am looking to speak to men - particularly in their 20s and 30s - who have run into reluctance by doctors to give them a vasectomy. A bit niche so please do retweet, I would very much appreciate it

item.description: Hello! I am looking to speak to men - particularly in their 20s and 30s - who have run into reluctance by doctors to give them a vasectomy. A bit niche so please do retweet, I would very much appreciate it

item.title: last night when I got in from v long journey home there was a massive dead spider in my living room and I have only now conjured the mental fortitude to get it out. was v close to offering anyone in the Peckham area a tenner to come and deal w it
